subject: Football
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: By not taking part in the settlement, designed to pay those with neurological conditions, the players could have preserved the right to continue suing the league for injuries related to head hits.
snippet: By not taking part in the settlement, designed to pay those with neurological conditions, the players could have preserved the right to continue suing the league for injuries related to head hits.
